      • getEntitySpawnPacket

        public static Packet getEntitySpawnPacket(Entity entity)
        Builds the 'Spawn' packet using the Custom Payload packet on the 'Forge' channel. Supports entities that have custom spawn data, as well as the generic 'Owner' construct.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity instance to spawn
        Returns:
        The spawn packet, or null if we arn't spawning it.
